// A list of JARs to use on RHEL 7.
// Each item should be an artifact name or coordinate that
// build-jar-repository can understand.
antlr
aopalliance
apache-mime4j
atinject
bcprov-jdk16
c3p0
candlepin-guice // This will pull in all the jars under candlepin-guice
commons-codec
commons-collections
commons-io
commons-lang
dom4j
gettext-commons
glassfish-jaxb/jaxb-impl
guava
hibernate-commons-annotations
hibernate-jpa-2.0-api
hibernate-validator
hibernate4-c3p0
hibernate4-core
hibernate4-entitymanager
hornetq-commons
hornetq-core-client
hornetq-journal
hornetq-server
httpcomponents/httpclient
istack-commons-runtime
jackson-annotations
jackson-core
jackson-databind
jackson-jaxrs-providers/jackson-jaxrs-base
jackson-jaxrs-providers/jackson-jaxrs-json-provider
jackson-module-jaxb-annotations
javamail/mail
javassist
jboss-logging
jta
liquibase
log4j
logback/logback-classic
logback/logback-core
netty
oauth/oauth
oauth/oauth-provider
postgresql-jdbc
resteasy/jaxrs-api
resteasy/resteasy-atom-provider
resteasy/resteasy-guice
resteasy/resteasy-jaxb-provider
resteasy/resteasy-jaxrs
resteasy/resteasy-multipart-provider
scannotation
servlet
sisu-cglib/cglib
slf4j/api
slf4j/jcl-over-slf4j
validation-api
